text: Ani kaphirance jhundacya jhunda jahannamakade hakata nele jatila jevha te ticyajavala pohacatila, tice daravaje tyancyasathi ughadale jatila ani tithale raksaka tyanna vicaratila ki kaya tumacya javala tumacyacamadhuna rasula (sandesavahaka) ale navhate? Je tumhala tumacya palanakartyancya ayati vacuna aikavita hote ani tumhala ya divasacya bhetibabata savadha karita hote. He uttara detila ki hoya! Ka nahi? Parantu azaba (siksa yatane) ce pharmana kaphiranna (sevati) lagu jhale
